component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes;
longitude false java.lang.String The longitude of the marker. If not set then the parent map longitude will be taken.
latitude false java.lang.String The latitude of the marker. If not set then the parent map latitude will be taken.
address false java.lang.String
The address you wish the marker to point to. If you use this attribute donot longitude or latitude attributes.
locationNotFoundErrorMessage false java.lang.String (GClientGeocoder) service not found the address location The error message that should appear if the address location doesnot exist
jsVariable false java.lang.String
This flag determines the JavaScript variable you want to use for referring to the marker. Use this attribute if you want to use write additional JavaScript code for the marker to customize it.
draggable false java.lang.String false
This flag determines whether the marker is draggable.
showInformationEvent false java.lang.String click
This attribute determines the event on which the marker information will be shown. The marker information should be represented as a child htmlInformationWindow component of the marker component.
